write_data_by_name.name: Write data by name
write_data_by_name.description: Write a value to the connected ADS device.

adshub.name: ADS Hub
adshub.description: The name of the Ads Hub to target. (Default = HUB1)

adsvar.name: ADS Variable
adsvar.description: The name of the variable to write to.

adstype.name: ADS Type
adstype.description: The data type of the variable to write to.

value.name: Value
value.description: The value to write to the variable.
